allow: Bash(powershell -Command "(Get-Content schema.sql -Raw) -replace ''category VARCHAR\(100\) NOT NULL,\s+constraint_content TEXT NOT NULL,\s+priority_level INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,\s+examples TEXT,'', ''constraint_content TEXT NOT NULL,'' | Set-Content schema.sql")

Bash(powershell -Command "(Get-Content schema.sql -Raw) -replace ''CREATE INDEX idx_constraints_priority ON ai_constraint_guidelines\(priority_level DESC\);\s+CREATE INDEX idx_constraints_category ON ai_constraint_guidelines\(category\);'', '''' | Set-Content schema.sql")
